27,http://www.armslist.com/posts/2160027,For Sale:  Sig Sauer 556R,"Charleston, Charleston, South Carolina","$ 1,400","Listed On: Thursday, October 3, 2013",Rifles,Sig Sauer                                                                                ,7.62x39                                                                                ,Semi-automatic                                                                                ,Rifle,"New in the Box from Sig Sauer, the 556-R. This version of the venerable 556 combat rifle is chambered in the more powerful 7.62x39mm (7.62 Soviet) and accepts standard AK47 magazines!  Included is a 30-round Bulgarian AK mag.  This gun is for the black quad-rail version that sports a full-length picatinny-rail across the top for mounting optics.  It came packaged from Sig Sauer with a new Sig-Tac red dot optic, complete with mount, ready to rock.  This battery powered sight has 11 different brightness settings, as well as what appears to be two settings for using with Night Vision devices.  It may not be an Aimpoint,but it’s a pretty well-built little optic.

Side folding stock, reliable piston system, this gun is awesome and hard to come by with the quad-rail (also includes Ergo ladder rail covers).  Why buy the .223 version of the Sig556 when you can own the 556 R (the “R” is for Russian)….more powerful cartridge, more affordable ammunition, runs with AK-47 mags (millions of cheap magazines to stock up on).  Now you can own the real deal!  This is the 2nd generation of this model, Gen 2, they worked the bugs out of the original design and now they run great."

31,http://www.armslist.com/posts/2160031,For Sale:  Bushmaster M4A3/M4A2 AR-15 E2S,"Liberty, New York, United States","$ 1,450","Listed On: Friday, September 27, 2013",Rifles,no type,no type,no type,Rifle,"The Bushmaster M4A3/M4A2 type carbines combine light weight with plenty of .223 caliber firepower. The chrome lined barrel offers maximum longevity and accuracy. A telescoping buttstock brings light weight, ease of carrying and quick handling.

Forged, lightweight 7075T6 aircraft quality aluminum receivers are designed for simplicity of maintenance and reliability of operation. They incorporate all M16A3/M16A2 design improvements including a detachable carry handle, cartridge case deflector, last round bolt hold open and raised ridges for magazine release button protection.
A manganese phosphate outer coating insures complete protection against corrosion or rust on the barrel and all other critical steel parts of the weapon.
The carbine includes a permanently installed Bushmaster ""IZZY"" flash suppressor ,
lockable storage case complete with black web sling, 30 round magazine, operating and safety instruction manual and one year warranty."

41,http://www.armslist.com/posts/2160041,For Sale:  NEW KEL-TEC P-3AT 6+1 380 ACP,"hard & 315, Columbus, Ohio",$ 250,"Listed On: Friday, September 27, 2013",Handguns,Smith & Wesson                                                                                ,380 ACP                                                                                ,Double Action                                                                                ,Pistol,"RAJAC FIREARMS POWELL OHIO 614*208*5444
The Factory Specifications are as follows:

Overall Height: 3.5""
Width: 0.77""

Caliber: 380
Mags: (1) 6rd
Action: Double Action Only

""The P-3AT is a semi-automatic, locked breech pistol, chambered for the .380 Auto cartridge. It has been developed from our highly successful P-32 pistol with negligible increase in weight and size.
The slidestop has been eliminated and the magazine capacity reduced to 6 rounds due to the larger cartridge. The firing mechanism is double action only. The magazine has a 6 round capacity.
The KEL-TEC P-3AT is the lightest .380 Auto pistol ever made. Thanks to its locking dynamics and superior ergonometry, perceived recoil and practical accuracy are comparable to much larger guns.

The P-3AT is mainly intended for plainclothes police officers as a secondary weapon, or for concealed carry by licensed citizens. The small grip size and light trigger pull make the P-3AT ideal for female shooters.

The P-3AT has five main component groups: barrel, slide, firing mechanism, grip, and magazine. The barrel is made of SAE 4140 ordnance steel, heat treated to 48 HRC. The slide is also 4140 steel, and contains the firing pin and the extractor.

The rectangular frame is machined from solid 7075-T6 aluminum and houses the firing mechanism. The trigger connects via a transfer bar to the hammer. The hammer is driven by a novel free floating extension spring. The light weight firing pin transmits the energy of the hammer to ignite the primer. After firing, the hammer block holds the hammer away from the firing pin, providing a mechanical safety.""
DEALER TRANSACTION, NICS check must be completed
and OH sales tax applies.

Description: Factory New Kel-Tec PF9 9mm compact semi-auto pistol!

The PF-9 retains the best features from our P-11 and P-3AT pistols combined into the flattest and lightest single stack 9mm configuration ever made. The barrel, locking system, slide stop, assembly pin, front sight, recoil springs and guide rod are adapted from the P-11. The PF-9 is nearly identical to the P-11 in length and height and shares the same exterior controls. The shorter trigger system with integral hammer block and the extraction system are adapted from the P-3AT. Just like the P-11, the PF-9 will accept +P ammunition, however, not with continuous use.
RAJAC FIREARMS POWEL OHIO 614*208*5444

The rear sight is a new design and is adjustable for windage with the supplied allen wrench as well as for elevation with the use of shims (not included). The included 7 round rectangular magazine is supplied with a finger extension base plate and numbered holes. The under barrel accessory rail shares the dimensions of the MIL-STD-1913 picatinny rail although there is only one locking notch in the forward position.

478,http://www.armslist.com/posts/2160478,For Sale:  Kel-Tec KSG,"Southend, Lexington, Kentucky","$ 1,050","Listed On: Friday, September 27, 2013",Shotguns,no type,12 Gauge                                                                                ,Pump Action                                                                                ,Shotgun,"Unfired KSG Bullpup Shotgun
It has the updated internals/cartridge stop
KSG

The KSG ejects downward and is fully ambidextrous. The KSG weighs 6.9 lbs. and is as compact as legally possible with a 26.1” overall length and an 18.5” cylinder bore barrel. Even with this compact size, the internal dual tube magazines hold an impressive 13 rounds of 12 gauge 3” rounds in total (6 per tube + 1 in the chamber) 15 rounds of 2 3/4"" (7 per tube + 1 in the chamber). It can also reliably shoot shells as short as 1 3/4"" up to the 3"".
This simple and reliable pump action feeds from either the left or right tube. The feed side is manually selected by a lever located behind the trigger guard.

The pump includes an under picatinny rail for the mounting of a forward grip, a light, or a laser. The included top picatinny sight rail will accept many types of optics or iron sights. Forward and rear sling loops are built in, and a basic sling is included. The soft rubber butt pad helps to tame recoil.

The KSG receiver is made from hardened steel and includes the magazine tubes which have been welded in place. The grip and stock assembly is made of glass reinforced nylon (Zytel) and is easily disassembled by pushing out 2 pins, which store in 2 holes in the grip when removed. The barrel and pump assembly is removed by loosening the 2 front magazine tube nuts with a coin and sliding the assembly forward.
Text me at 859 three 3 eight seven 3 nine 9
Buyer must be legally able to purchase in Ky"

621,http://www.armslist.com/posts/2160621,"For Sale:  KIMBER, SPRINGFIELD, GLOCK, RUGER, SMITH & WESSON, ROCK ISLAND, HK,AND MANY OTHERS","Everett / seattle, Seattle, Washington",FREE,"Listed On: Friday, September 27, 2013",Handguns,Smith & Wesson                                                                                ,357 Magnum                                                                                ,Double Action,no type,"We all seenthe amuseing adds here where folks are trying to sell their guns but what really amazes me is the high prices some what for their used guns. Its also amuseing that every gun has low round count NBF, NIB, special , rare, custom blah, blah, blah etc. ok hahaha I didnt know there were so many rare special guns that they made in the thousands .

We all, like me have also dealt with rude people on this site who never get back to you or they want more money for a trade???? whats that all about?? A gun is worth what its worth and no more. I have been going into West Coast Armory lately and found that they will sell you a brand new gun for pennies more than the used guns on this site. If they dont have it they will order it for you with a friendly smile to boot. So people get real with your prices you are never going to get every nickel you put into your gun that is unless you find a dumb ass who doesnt know a thing about guns or if you really do have a rare special gun. Out of the many guns I have tried to buy  or inquire about here maybe 20% arent rude jerks who think they and there gun is special.
So do your self a favor and check out The friendly people and guns at West Coast Armory. In the long run you could save time and money."

The new M6 Individual Carbine family is the direct descendant of the rifles developed by LWRCI™ to meet the requirements of the U.S. Army Individual Carbine program. It includes some revolutionary new features while maintaining the basic M4/AR15/M16 architecture that has served our nation’s armed forces well for the past 40 years.

All members of the IC family feature our new fully ambidextrous lower receiver. Dual controls for bolt catch and release, magazine release, and fire control mean that both right- and left- handed shooters can use the rifle to its full effectiveness. In addition, dual controls give shooters the option of using their offhand side to accommodate barriers or injury. They can effectively manipulate the controls without having to switch hands. Despite its dramatically improved functionality, this new dual control lower receiver is compatible with all legacy AR15 pattern upper receivers.
The new Individual Carbine family from LWRCI shows that, at times, evolution takes a giant leap forward.

This caliber gives you much greater velocity and power than the typical .308, and as far as ballistics are concerned, the BAD NEWS rifle is going to be the flatter shooting gun for long range shots.

The  rifle is a piston-driven semi-auto; this means you can expect greater range and a higher level of reliability by running a cleaner and cooler rifle. The muzzle break on these Noreen’s significantly suppresses recoil. Additionally, the semi-auto nature of the rifle will naturally recoil less than a bolt action because part of the felt recoil is going to chamber the next round. Lighter recoil is a huge advantage when you’re looking for a rifle with a faster and more accurate follow-up shot."

The “Baby” of the Desert Eagle family offers an excellent handgun value and plenty of firepower. The grip design is exceptionally comfortable and well liked by shooters. Since 2008 the Baby Desert Eagle was no longer imported into the US, however beginning again in 2011 with the acquisition of Magnum Research by Kahr Arms we are excited to bring this popular firearm back to the US market.

Trigger action of the Baby Desert Eagle pistol is double action/single action (DA/SA) and is available in three popular calibers (9mm, .40 S&W, .45 ACP) and several barrel lengths. The Baby Desert Eagle pistol is available in either a steel frame or a polymer frame with a black finish. The steel frames and slides are produced from high quality carbon steel with an attractive matte black oxide finish. Full size and semi-compact models feature a tactical rail for optional lasers and/or flashlights. All models come with a slide mounted decocking safety with dual levers and upgraded fixed combat sights with three white dots. The rear sight is well designed in appearance and is snag free."
